name: The Man 2
description:
"A "classic" (not really) returns featuring a whole 2 new features! It's the same game you knew before, but just a little better than before!!"

The Man 2 is just The Man 1, but resprited, reconfigured, and reprogrammed. It's essentially a beefed up version of the first game. It features a customization mode that allows you to tamper with the enemy layout.
